translations: n．电子邮件：通过互联网发送和接收的电子信息。
· I receive a lot of emails every day.
我每天收到很多电子邮件。

sentences.sentence: He emails every week without fail.
sentences.translation: 他每周必定发电子邮件。

sentences.sentence: I have a stack of emails in my inbox.
sentences.translation: 我的收件箱里有很多电邮。

sentences.sentence: I can send him emails or print it out.
sentences.translation: 我可以给他发电子邮件或者把它打印出来。
